javelin.model.world.place

Class WorldPlace

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.world.place.WorldPlace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dungeon, GuardedPlace, Lair, Outpost, Portal, Town

    public abstract class WorldPlace
extends WorldActor
    A WorldActor that is actually a place that represent a location to be entered or explored.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    WorldScreen.getactors(), Serialized Form

      • interact

        public static boolean interact(WorldPlace p)
        Called when this place is reached with the active Squad.
        Returns:
        true if the Squad is able to interact with this place, false if a garrison defends it.
        Throws:
        StartBattle

      • destroy

        public java.lang.Boolean destroy(Incursion attacker)
        Description copied from class: WorldActor
        Called when an incursion reaches this actor's location.
        Specified by:
        destroy in class WorldActor
        Returns:
        true if this place gets destroyed, false if the Incursion is destroyed or null if neither.
        See Also:
        Incursion#ignoreincursion(Incursion), Incursion.fight(int, int)

      • getel

        protected abstract java.lang.Integer getel(int attackerel)
        Only called for sacrificeable places when being reached by an Incursion.
        Parameters:
        attackerel - Given an attacking encounter level...
        Returns:
        the defending encounter level. A null value is allowed because some places should not be conquered.
        See Also:
        WorldActor.impermeable, Incursion.fight(int, int)

      • ishostile

        public boolean ishostile()

      • defend

        protected boolean defend()
        Returns:
        false if this is unguarded, true if it is guarded but the player aborted combat.
        Throws:
        StartBattle - If the player chooses to attack a defended location.

        public static boolean headsup(java.util.List<Combatant> opponents,
                              java.lang.String description)
        Offers information and a chance to back out of the fight.
        Parameters:
        opponents - Will be Squad.spot()ted.
        description - What to describe this place as.
        Returns:
        true if player confirms engaging in battle.
        Throws:
        RepeatTurnException
